EmailTemplate.name: SSSW Direct Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Australia Post - Auto Reply - Please visit Help & Support
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Australia Post
Help & Support
Sorry, we were unable to process your request.
This means that your enquiry cannot be actioned at this time. Here are some FAQ's that may answer your enquiry.

Thank you,
Australia Post [{!Case.Thread_Id}]
